audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_4:: Record sound of what happens at the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_13: Tell us how the event changes as it progresses.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_11: Record another sound of something important to the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_3:: Ask someone who is part of the event: What happens at the event?
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_18: Record sound of the end of the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_14: Record another sound of something happening at the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_9:: Tell us some interesting facts about the event or why it happens.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_7:: Record sound of a place important to the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::title: Event Video
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_16: Record sound of the result of people interacting at the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_12: Record sound of how the event ends.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_1:: Record sound of preparation for the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::text_card_0:: This template will help you report on an event in your community. The clips suggested cover the primary shots you will need to tell the story of most events. Feel free to skip shots, or use different shots as needed. Additionally, adapt the suggested questions to suit your needs.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_10: Ask: Why is this event interesting?
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_15: Ask someone attending the event to talk about what they did.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_2:: Record sound of something introducing the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_8:: Record sound of people interacting at the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_6:: Ask an Expert to talk about the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_5:: Record something interesting about the event.
audiotemplate_report_event::clip_card_17: Tell us what is expected for the event the next time it happens.
